<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skinstitch Salve](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3359)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=623" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 296 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Price** 55 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This sticky salve stubbornly holds wounds closed and encourages swift natural healing. You can activate the salve in either of the following ways.

**Activate—Administer Stitch** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** You [Administer First Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=2396) without requiring healer's tools. You can either gain a +2 item bonus to the Medicine check or use the salve's Medicine modifier of +13 instead of your own.

**Activate—Stitch Wounds** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))    **Effect** You gain a +2 item bonus to the triggering Medicine check. If you roll a success on the Medicine check, you get a critical success instead.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Skinstitch Salve
